changeSet.author: makhmetov@soylent.io (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbms_type SET jdbc_url_format = 'jdbc:oceanbase://${DOLLAR_SIGN}{hostname}:${DOLLAR_SIGN}{port}/${DOLLAR_SIGN}{dbName}?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf-8&clientEncoding=utf-8', driver_class = 'com.alipay.oceanbase.jdbc.Driver' WHERE type = 'OCEANBASE';
